_comments: add a new card = add:true, newValues {}
select cards starting with a value = where: type~='Snow'
get card directly from Gatherer = where: gatherer='Serra Angel'

exceptions.where: title=(Chishiro, the Shattered Blade|Kotori, Pilot Prodigy|Kaima, the Fractured Calm|Shorikai, Genesis Engine|Myojin of Blooming Dawn|Myojin of Cryptic Dreams|Myojin of Grim Betrayal|Myojin of Roaring Blades|Myojin of Towering Might|Ruthless Technomancer|Go-Shintai of Life's Origin|Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful)

newValues._comment: Oddly, despite being commander cards, these don't appear in commander decks but only the normal Set Boosters
newValues.HERE: Need to only include the lower-numbered cards.. need two sets, regularIncludedInBooster and ExtendedArtIncludedInBooster
